name: nuttiness
content:
nuttiness noun [U]
(FOOD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of containing, tasting of, or being similar to nuts: The apricot pie has a hint of nuttiness. the sweet, earthy nuttiness of early-crop potatoes
More examplesFewer examplesThis richly fruity port is now showing a touch of the nuttiness of age.The nuttiness of the cheese calls for a dry white wine.The chocolate hazelnut spread was not too sweet with a good amount of nuttiness.
